ba278e88-6bb0-4c07-9028-0ee54fc36d59.benefit: I want session-aware context deduplication so repeated focus/list calls do not resend identical full content to the agent.
criteria: session up creates an active session context.
focus and node list/list-all output header-only for already served nodes in active session.
session context expires after 2 days and session.json is gitignored.

0b7841dd-dbfe-4874-9827-9535e2f64c8a.test_scenario: Given an active session, when focus/list commands return already-served nodes, then render header-only while allowing explicit node get for full details.
0b7841dd-dbfe-4874-9827-9535e2f64c8a.expected_result: Expected result: session up/tear/reset/info lifecycle and session resolution priority flag > env > session.json with 2-day expiration.

185f3732-93c5-48c9-8ddd-45c643379a4d.content: Implement session model, storage, command lifecycle, and focus/list dedup rendering with tests.
